name: ARCADEdreams's Blood Bath
description:
Thank you for the support !

Let the blood bath begin !

ARCADEdreams hosts its first ever Blood Bath tournament & chaos breaks loose !

8 players trade blood in a devastating fighting competition.

A throw back to classic fighting games in a anime art style that pays homage to the roots of the arcade fighter !

Key Features:

9 Game Modes

8 Characters

Retro 2D Pixel Art Style

Deep 808 Trap Soundtrack

Sexy Anime Fighting Game

Enjoy this dope fighting game today !

Recommended System Requirements

OS Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)

CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor

RAM 512 MB or more
